Articles.Content: So i rencently transferd my game(KSP) onto steam and i noticed i cant open the cheat engine menu, that i like to use to test my aircraft?!!? Did they take the cheats out? IK how to open it, i have done it many times before, is any one else having this problem,
The key was changed to Alt F-12

Isn't the point of testing to find out if something operates properly? Cheats kind of ruin that, don't you think?

Also debug menu is now Alt + F12, as Trux stated.
